definition: to fondle the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
to moisten/to be infected by/to receive benefit or advantage through a contact/to touch
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua

sentences.english: My favorite tree and pond, we enjoyed the beautiful view and the wildflowers while we jogging.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡的樹和湖，我們圍着草地一路沾花惹草地慢跑。

sentences.english: These findings don’t tell us whether it's sleeping around that triggers depression.
sentences.chinese: 這些發現並沒有告訴我們是否是沾花惹草導致了抑鬱。

sentences.english: He is very good husband and never runs around on his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他是個對妻子非常好的丈夫，從不在外沾花惹草。

definition: lit. to pick the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/fig. to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
to make hanky-panky/to seduce women
lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
(of a flower) to attract bees and butterflies/(fig.) to attract the opposite sex/to flirt
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
to spend one's time in drinking and pleasure (idiom); to indulge in sensual pleasures/life of debauchery
to hang around/to fool around/to live aimlessly
to cheat on one's spouse/to have an affair
(coll.) womanizer/skirt-chaser
to be promiscuous/to sleep around

definition: fickle (in love affairs)/dissipated/unfaithful/heart of a flower (pistil and stamen)
lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
fickle (woman)
to change at once on seeing sth different (idiom); loving fads and novelty/never satisfied with what one has
lit. say three in the morning but four in the evening (idiom); to change sth that is already settled upon/indecisive/to blow hot and cold
